content:
Somehow I completely missed this name at CMS Innovation for the past few years. This August tweet announced her departure and what sheâ€™s worked on, with emphasis on the importance of interop.

https://twitter.com/lisabari/status/1167281269962629120?s=21

This is my last week @CMSinnovates, and I'm reflecting on the last 3+ years with a general sense of pride at what I was able to accomplish, alongside a stellar team across CMS, HHS, and our colleagues across the government. 1/

- Lisa Bari (@lisabari)
